articles.author: Joe Jones
articles.title: Top ten takeaways from the draft UK GDPR reform - International Association of Privacy Professionals
articles.description: IAPP Research and Insights Director Joe Jones provides the top 10 takeaways from the new U.K. data protection reform bill.
articles.content:
At the time of last years IAPP Data Protection Intensive: U.K., no legislative proposals to reform the U.K. General Data Protection Regulation had been made public.
This year, on the first day of th… [+9232 chars]
